titles.title: Now the Light Has Gone Away

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Now the light has gone away; Father, listen while I pray, Asking Thee to watch and keep And to send me quiet sleep.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Jesus, Savior, wash away All that has been wrong today; Help me every day to be Good and gentle, more like Thee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Let my near and dear ones be Always near and dear to Thee. Oh, bring me and all I love To Thy happy home above.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Now my evening praise I give; Thou didst die that I might live. All my blessings come from Thee; Oh, how good Thou art to me!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Thou, my best and kindest Friend, Thou wilt love me to the end. Let me love Thee more and more, Always better than before.
